// Prepare the shell scripts based on deployconfig.json for each service (system and app)
node prep.js -f dd -c
// prep.js prepares the deployment scripts based on deployconfig.json. By customizing this script, you can change the deployment of the application services
// -c option will cleanup the tmpdir before running th script. Always recommended.
// 
// Prep and Run docker-compose using the following script which is placed in a local directory ./tmp
bash tmp/ddprep.sh
